events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

"Here we go again..." C-3PO continues to mutter protests as you march toward the hologram facility. Even having your protection doesn't seem to calm his nerves.

He is right to be nervous; with such valuable information, this facility is bound to be well guarded.

{-} Deploy <color="red">C-3PO</color> (Human-Cyborg Relations) to the red highlighted space. Apply +*2* additional health to <color="red">C-3PO</color>. While <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, apply +1 {G} to the defense results.
{-} Deploy <color="red">R2-D2</color> (Loyal Astromech) to the green highlighted space. <color="red">R2-D2</color>'s "Service" ability recovers *1* {H} instead of 1 {H}.
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText: Some sections of the facility wall have already crumbled, opening passages into the building.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The wall has crumbled here, opening a passage into the facility.

{-} A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.

The wall has crumbled here, opening a passage into the facility.

{-} A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.

The wall has crumbled here, opening a passage into the facility.

{-} A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.

The wall has crumbled here, opening a passage into the facility.

{-} A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.

eventActions.tbText: {-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.
According to your plans, the viewing room lies at the far end of the facility, controled by three workstations.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The workstation outside is half-buried in sand, but still operational.

{-} A healthy hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to try and discard that terminal.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} A healthy hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to try and discard that terminal. When all terminals are discarded, open the door to the Viewing Room.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Viewing Room opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defeated, or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Apply +*2* additional health to <color="red">C-3PO</color>. While <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, apply +1 {G} to the defense results.
{-} <color="red">R2-D2</color>'s "Service" ability recovers *1* {H} instead of 1 {H}.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.
{-} The door to the Viewing Room is locked. Other doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} A healthy hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to try and discard that terminal. When all terminals are discarded, open the door to the Viewing Room.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Viewing Room opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defeated, or when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Under the protection of your covering fire, C-3PO translates and stores the information contained in the hologram.

"...and I think Command will find it most pleasing,‚Äù he relates to you after you execute your escape. "Thank you again for your protection. If there is ever a way Artoo or I could be of assistance, we would be most pleased to help."

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">R2-D2</color> (Loyal Astromech) and <color="red">C-3PO</color> (Human-Cyborg Relations) as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

A well-placed blaster bolt flies true and hits C-3PO, deactivating him. You can only retreat with his body and hope he can be repaired.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to deactivate the terminal.

{-} Test or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The workstation outside is half-buried in sand, but still operational.

{-} A healthy hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to try and discard that terminal.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to deactivate the terminal.

{-} Test or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The workstation in the operations room is rusty, but still operational.

{-} A healthy hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to try and discard that terminal.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to deactivate the terminal.

{-} Test or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The workstation in the storage room is rusty, but still operational.

{-} A healthy hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to try and discard that terminal.

events.eventText: The door to the facility grinds open.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A weathered door leads into the hologram facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

events.eventText: The door opens to reveal a small room used to coordinate the facility's operations.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
An old door leads into the operations room.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

events.eventText: The door opens to reveal a small storage room.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
An old door leads into the storage room.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.tbText:
C-3PO gasps as troops continue to press the attack.

"When I reminded Command that I was fluent in over six million forms of communication, I didn't know this is what they had in mind!"
Another broken wall connects the operations room and the storage room.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The wall has crumbled here, opening a passage between the two rooms.

{-} A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.

The wall has crumbled here, opening a passage between the two rooms.

{-} A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.

events.eventText: You continue to slice through the door controls, seemingly making good progress. Unfortunately, that progress is also noticed by the Imperials, who trigger alarms that blare loudly in your ears as more defenses activate.
As you finally slice the last door control, the door to the viewing room slides open.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy door leads into the viewing room where the hologram is kept.

{-} The door is locked.

eventActions.tbText: The hologram you are looking for rests on a small pedestal in a corner of the room.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The old hologram rests on a small pedestal here.

{-} <color="red">C-3PO</color> can interact with the hologram to translate it, ending the mission.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} <color="red">C-3PO</color> can interact with the hologram to translate it.
{-} The Rebels win when the hologram is translated.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Apply +*2* additional health to <color="red">C-3PO</color>. While <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, apply +1 {G} to the defense results.
{-} <color="red">R2-D2</color>'s "Service" ability recovers *1* {H} instead of 1 {H}.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent tunnels. A small figure can spend 1 movement point while on a tunnel to place his figure on an empty space containing a tunnel of the same color.
{-} <color="red">C-3PO</color> can interact with the hologram to translate it.
{-} The Rebels win when the hologram is translated.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defeated, or when all heroes are wounded.
